title: Summa Health Medical Group Internal Medicine
description: Here you can search for a Summa physician by name, hospital specialty, or location. Take the first step towards better health at Summa Health.
sitename: Dr. Catherine Y Taras, MD - Akron, OH - Family Medicine
cleaned_text: Catherine Y Taras, MD Family Medicine Locations Summa Health Medical Group Internal Medicine About Catherine Y Taras Dr. Taras was born and raised in Youngstown, Ohio. After completing her residency at Summa Akron City Hospital, she has practiced in the Akron and Stow areas for 20 years. She is active in community volunteer projects with Faithful Servants, where she provides urgent care to the uninsured, and precepts medical students from NEOMED. Dr. Taras enjoys traveling and a variety of outdoor activities with her husband and son. Expertise Education Wright State University Medical School, 1988 Akron City Hospital Residency, Family Practice, 1991 Ratings & Reviews Surveys are randomly sent by Press Ganey Associates, Inc. to patients after their in-office visit. Press Ganey provides the survey scores to Summa Health. These patient survey scores are noted here and updated on a monthly basis. Insurance Note: This is not an all-inclusive list of health plans. Additional health plans may be accepted. Please contact your insurance provider for confirmation. - Buckeye (Ambetter Product) - Buckeye Advantage (Medicare Product) - Buckeye Medicaid - ChoiceCare - Cofinity - Direct Care America - Emerald Health Network - First Health Network - Fortified Provider Network
